title: Budget Creation and Cost Calculation
description: Verify the ability to create detailed budgets including materials, kits, and services, and ensure automatic cost calculation and margin computation are accurate.

steps.description: Navigate to the budget creation page
Add multiple materials, modular kits, and services with specified quantities and prices
Save the budget
Verify the total cost and margin are correctly calculated and displayed

title: Budget PDF Generation with Customization and Watermark
description: Verify generation of customizable PDF budgets with correct data, template application, watermark display, and download functionality.

steps.description: Open an existing budget
Customize PDF template and add watermark
Generate the PDF
Check that the PDF contains all budget details, applied template, watermark, and can be downloaded successfully

title: Dashboard Real-time Statistics and Alerts
description: Ensure the dashboard correctly updates and displays real-time statistics, alerts, and quick action shortcuts.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard
Trigger data updates such as new budget creation and sales
Confirm the dashboard refreshes display to show updated statistics and appropriate alert notifications without manual reload
Verify quick action buttons navigate correctly to respective sections

title: Project Creation from Approved Budgets
description: Check the conversion of approved budgets into sales and linked projects to initiate execution workflow.

steps.description: Select an approved budget and convert it into a sale
Create a project linked to the sale
Verify the sale and project link exist, and project status is initialized correctly

title: Kanban Board Project Status Management
description: Validate project status tracking and task management using Kanban boards, including transitions and status updates.

steps.description: Open the project Kanban board
Create new tasks and assign statuses
Drag and drop tasks between different statuses
Confirm tasks update status accordingly, and Kanban board reflects latest changes

title: Worksite Task Progress and Photo Reporting
description: Verify the worksite module allows task assignments, progress tracking, photo uploads, and team allocation accurately.

steps.description: Assign tasks to team members for a worksite
Update task progress statuses
Upload photos documenting task progress
Allocate electricians and teams to the worksite
Validate task progress updates are saved and displayed correctly
Confirm uploaded photos are attached and visible in the system
Ensure team allocation changes reflect accurately in scheduling

title: Team and Resource Scheduling with Gantt Charts
description: Ensure that team scheduling respects availability controls and Gantt charts correctly visualize resource allocation over time.

steps.description: Access the team scheduling interface
Assign resources to projects/tasks respecting availability constraints
Verify scheduling conflicts are prevented and proper warnings shown
Check that Gantt charts display resource allocation timelines accurately

title: Client Management CRUD Operations
description: Test full CRUD operations on client records including creation, editing, viewing, and deletion.

steps.description: Create a new client with valid information
Ensure the client is successfully saved and visible in the clients list
Edit client details and save changes
Verify the updated details are stored and displayed correctly
View the client history and details
Delete the client record
Confirm the client is removed from the system and cannot be accessed

title: Material Stock Control and Alerts
description: Validate stock control features including categorization, adding materials, stock deduction on usage, and stock alert notifications.

steps.description: Add new electrical materials to inventory with categories and suppliers
Simulate utilization of materials reducing stock levels
Check that stock quantities update accurately after usage
Trigger stock alert by reducing material below defined threshold and verify alert notification is generated

title: Supplier and Purchase Order Management
description: Verify CRUD operations on suppliers and purchase orders, including invoice handling and stock updates upon purchase completion.

steps.description: Create a new supplier record
Validate supplier is saved and listed properly
Create a purchase order linking to supplier and buy materials
Upload purchase invoice
Mark purchase order as completed
Confirm inventory stock updates reflecting the purchased materials

title: Financial Module Transactions and Reporting
description: Test creation, editing, payment tracking of accounts receivable and payable, fixed expenses, and verify financial reports accuracy.

steps.description: Create accounts receivable linked to sales
Create accounts payable and record fixed expenses
Record payments against receivables and payables
Verify all financial transactions reflect accurately in reports and dashboards

title: Electronic Invoice (NFe) Issuance and Status Control
description: Ensure electronic invoices are correctly issued using digital certificates with real-time status synchronization and error handling.

steps.description: Issue an NFe electronic invoice for a completed sale
Validate correct use of digital certificates
Check invoice status updates are synchronized and visible in the system
Simulate failure scenarios (e.g., invalid certificates) and verify proper error messages

title: Role-based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that system access and feature permissions are controlled and enforced correctly according to user roles using JWT and RBAC.

steps.description: Login as different user roles (e.g., admin, project manager, finance)
Attempt to access features outside assigned permissions
Confirm unauthorized feature access is blocked with appropriate feedback
Access permitted features and verify functionality is available

title: Data Import and Export in CSV, JSON, and XML Formats
description: Test reliable import and export of materials, templates, and invoices without data loss or corruption in all supported formats.

steps.description: Export data sets (materials, templates, invoices) in CSV, JSON, XML
Verify exported files contain all expected records and format integrity is preserved
Import valid files of each format into the system
Confirm data is correctly loaded, duplicates handled properly, and no data corruption occurred
Import corrupted or improperly formatted files
Verify system handles import errors gracefully with descriptive error messages

title: Audit Log Capture and Traceability
description: Verify audit logs capture all critical user actions and system changes for security and compliance.

steps.description: Perform various user actions including login, record creation, editing, and deletions
Check audit logs record all actions with correct timestamps, users, and details
Attempt unauthorized actions and failed authentication attempts
Verify these events are logged accurately for traceability

title: User Interface Responsiveness and Accessibility
description: Validate that all major UI components across the system are responsive on multiple device sizes and accessible with proper feedback and error handling.

steps.description: Access the system using desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes
Verify layout adjusts appropriately without loss of functionality or content overflow
Use keyboard navigation and screen readers to interact with core components
Confirm UI elements provide proper focus, labels, and ARIA attributes
Trigger input validation errors and system errors
Check user-friendly error messages and feedback are displayed

title: Authentication System with JWT Token Handling
description: Verify login, logout, and token expiration handling using JWT, ensuring secure session management.

steps.description: Login using valid credentials
Confirm JWT token is issued and stored securely
Attempt to access protected resources with valid and invalid tokens
Verify access is granted only with valid tokens
Logout from the system
Ensure token invalidation and restricted access post-logout
Simulate token expiration and verify user is required to re-authenticate

title: Error Handling on Invalid Input Data
description: Check system responses and error messages when users input invalid or incomplete data in all core modules.

steps.description: Enter invalid or missing required fields on budget, client, project, and invoice forms
Verify validation errors are shown inline with descriptive messages
Submit invalid data and observe system behavior
Confirm submission is blocked and no corrupted data is saved
